thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 6 of 121
thread.title: nikki monahan

author: nikki monahan
title: nikki monahan
text: A colleague referred me ezCater and now I can't get enough of them. They offer a wide variety and selection of catering choices. Their Chat personnel are helpful and go over-and-beyond to assist with your questions, contacting the restaurants directly. Once your order has been placed you receive an acknowledgement immediately. ezCater is very organized and you are generously rewarded with credits toward Amazon gift cards. I have used other catering services and ezCater is by far the best.
